title.rendered: Weekly Meal Plan for Moderately Active Lifestyle Diabetes – Day 3

content.rendered:
In This Article

  • 1 Breakfast
  • 2 Lunch
  • 3 Snack
  • 4 Dinner

Breakfast

  • 1 portion Oven Baked Eggs with Tomato Salsa
  • 1 cup Orange Juice, freshly squeezed

Lunch

  • 1 serving Mushroom Stuffed Turkey
  • 1 cup Garlicky Roasted Broccoli

Snack

  • 2 Cups Popcorn, air popped
  • 1 cup Tea/Coffee with 1% Milk

Dinner

  • 1 serving Seared Duck with Red Onion Relish
  • 1 bowl Spinach Salad with Dried Cranberries & Flaked Almonds

itemListElement.name: Weekly Meal Plan for Moderately Active Lifestyle Diabetes – Day 3

@graph.name: Sharda Agarwal
@graph.description: Sharda Agarwal is a qualified Functional Nutrition Therapy Practitioner & a Certified Blood Chemistry Analyst. She first used dietary supplements to overcome a debilitating migraine she suffered for years. Since then she has studied the subjects of nutrition and nutrients extensively. She uses this to manage the health of her family at home and with Sepalika.
